snippet.title: Gunlord (Dreamcast) - Intro movie (1080p HQ)
snippet.description:
There wasn't a good quality version of this game's intro on YouTube so I decided to upload it. I know that if my 10 year old self saw this intro he would think it was the coolest thing ever, bar none. Your are cute.

This was recorded with an Avermedia capture card using an OSSC in 480p x2 mode and a DVDO Edge.
